scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:firefox && bun run build:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: bun run build:firefox:js && bun run build:firefox:assets
scripts.build:chrome: bun run build:chrome:js && bun run build:chrome:assets
scripts.build:firefox:js: mkdir -p dist/firefox && bun build packages/extension/src/Content/index.ts --outfile dist/firefox/content.js --target browser && bun build packages/extension/src/Background/index.ts --outfile dist/firefox/background.js --target browser && bun build packages/extension/src/Popup/index.tsx --outfile dist/firefox/popup.js --target browser
scripts.build:chrome:js: mkdir -p dist/chrome && bun build packages/extension/src/Content/index.ts --outfile dist/chrome/content.js --target browser && bun build packages/extension/src/Background/index.ts --outfile dist/chrome/background.js --target browser && bun build packages/extension/src/Popup/index.tsx --outfile dist/chrome/popup.js --target browser
scripts.build:firefox:assets: cp packages/extension/manifest.v2.json dist/firefox/manifest.json && cp packages/extension/src/Popup/popup.html dist/firefox/popup.html && cp packages/extension/src/Popup/themes.css dist/firefox/themes.css && cp packages/extension/src/Popup/theme-loader.js dist/firefox/theme-loader.js
scripts.build:chrome:assets: cp packages/extension/manifest.v3.json dist/chrome/manifest.json && cp packages/extension/src/Popup/popup.html dist/chrome/popup.html && cp packages/extension/src/Popup/themes.css dist/chrome/themes.css && cp packages/extension/src/Popup/theme-loader.js dist/chrome/theme-loader.js
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run format
